column4: Do I need to do something special to play a standard audio cd in jaunty?
no
when I insert one and try to open it via device notifier, it only offers extract with k3b or open with dolphin.  I cannot get anything to read it and play
your on Kubuntu?
any ideas?
what happens when you open the CD up in amarok?
where does an audiocd mount?
on the desktop normalley,  but  you should see it there in  computer, and in  /media/   or /mnt as well
not in mnt or media and I don't have them mount on desktop.  However, in dolphin it shows on left bar and I can see the tracks, but cant get amarok to find it so I can play it.
ok  try another player
banshee :)  rythombox etc
VLC is more of a video player than a music player
banshee is putting an x next to each track I try to play
You been trying to set up parentol controls?
oh a Ubunt using classroom
yes.
Eubuntu?
I can ping a workstation on LAN from gateway and anything on net but from  inside lan I cannot get out
I can't exactly help, you could try #kubuntu though
ok
sadly sometimes, hardware support brakes, when upgrading Ubuntu versions
